front.title: IEEE Draft Guide for Application and Management of Stationary Batteries Used in Cycling Service

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: battery cycling; battery maintenance; battery operation; standby battery; stationary battery
front.abstract: A stationary battery can be operated in two basic modes: 1) standby (or float), and 2) cycling. Many standards developed for standby stationary applications do not apply to cycling stationary applications, and vice versa. The purpose of this guide is to differentiate between these two applications and increase awareness of why and how their different operation and maintenance practices should be managed differently.
